name: Cleansing the Valley
description: The Electro Lord's defeat has weakened the Nepian's hold on the valley, but they're not giving up easily. More scouts and warriors are moving in to replace their fallen leader. I need you to clear the valley of these reinforcements. This will give us time to prepare for the next phase of our mission.
requirements: Narvark wants you to eliminate 8 Nepian scouts and 3 Nepian warriors throughout the valley
completiontext: Excellent work! The valley is much cleaner now. The Nepian's reinforcements have been cut off, and we can feel the dimensional energy stabilizing slightly. This gives us the breathing room we need.
